message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $90.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $85.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $82? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $84.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at $81. Can you make it work for that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $83.
I'm really close to my budget, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $80.50. Can we make a deal at this price?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I can offer it to you for $82.
I'm not willing to pay more than $80.50. I'm going to have to consider buying from John at $100 if we can't agree on a price. Can you meet me at $80.50?
